first - thanks for the help.

somethings are not clear to me yet.
this is what i know

1. heritrix creates a : IAH-20041115081418-00001-zen.arc.gz
2. gunzip -d IAH-20041115081418-00001-zen.arc.gz 
3. ExtractCDX IAH-20041115081418-00001-zen.arc > arc.cdx 

4. Unclear about what to do next ?????
   Lars wrote:
   "Remember that you have to sort the CDX file "
   so is this 
    cat arc.cdx | sort > sortedArc.cdx 

   ok so now lets say i have the arc.cdx (sorted of course) 

   now what ? 
   place it in the same dir as the arch file

   and invoke 

   dk.netarkivet.proxyviewer.ProxyLauncher server/addport/8081
   archives/addarc/TEST/tmp/heritrix/test/arcs/arc.cdx

   and the ProxyServer will know how to connect the info in the 
   arc.cdx to IAH-20041115081418-00001-zen.arc in the same dir ?

5. any idea why doesn favicon.ico keep appearing in the printouts as
   the first indexPath that is missing.



thanks so much for all your help.
i'll be sure to aggregate all this when i'm done and put it in writing
for future questions.
